text: Lycorine , a pyrrolophenanthridine alkaloid , is one the major alkaloids found in H . littoralis [ 2 , 7 ] . It displays strong antiviral effect against poliovirus , measles , and herpes simplex type 1 viruses [ 8 ] . Besides , lycorine also possesses potent antiretroviral [ 9 ] , antimitotic [ 10 , 11 ] , and cytotoxic activities [ 2 , 12 ] .
